title: Happy Trails
author: Rock
citation: Rock. "Happy Trails: experience with Paroxetine (ID 10869)". Erowid.org. Jan 12, 2002. erowid.org/exp/10869
footer:

[ Switch Colors ]
report: I just read some of the reports about Paxil. I thought it was just me that had the bad withdrawal symptoms and saw trails in the morning. I wonder sometimes why I only see traisl when I wake up. Even if I nap during the day I wake up and see them. Also, when I first started taking it, I ran out after about 2 months, and I was a wreck!! I started acting like I was 5 or something. I threw tantrums, I cried at the drop of a hat, I was all clingy with my grrrlfriend. It was a terrible time. I'm thinkin that maybe I will switch drugs. Paxil has been more trouble than it is worth
